name: WORX 20-Volt Max Lithium Cordless Jawsaw Chain Saw Cutter Tool - WG320

reviews.name: Worx Cordless 20V MAX Lithium Jawsaw
reviews.reviewText: The Jawsaw is very easy to use and does a great job. I am a 73 year old woman, and can use with ease. Best chain saw we have ever used. It does every thing it advertised.
reviews.title: 18 September 2013

reviews.name: Worx Cordless 20V MAX Lithium Jawsaw
reviews.reviewText:
I was hopeful but somewhat skeptical that the Jawsaw would perform as advertised. It's easy to use and works really well. I'm small, and can still use the Jawsaw for quite a while before it gets heavy. You can use it from many angles, and it's easy to use whether you're left-handed or right-handed.

One of the best purchases I've made in a long time.
reviews.title: The Jawsaw is great for women!

reviews.name: Worx Cordless 20V MAX Lithium Jawsaw
reviews.reviewText: A little pricey but works great
reviews.title: Great Saw

reviews.name: Worx Cordless 20V MAX Lithium Jawsaw
reviews.reviewText: This works really great for me and I highly recommend this saw. Easy to use and SAFE. I am afraid of other chain saws but feel very comfortable using this. The 20 volt battery lasts a long time (never lost power even on days we used it a lot) - also easy to re-charge. I followed advise of others and didn't get the extension and am glad I read that tip
reviews.title: I love it!

reviews.name: Worx Cordless 20V MAX Lithium Jawsaw
reviews.reviewText: Great saw that gets the job done without the FEAR of a chain saw.
reviews.title: Would buy another one in a heartbeat!
